attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in current Prime minister Theresa May & the Conservatives.
attributes.background:
No messing around - a simple straight forward message to this government from UK citizens: 

Vote of no confidence in current Prime minister Theresa May & the Conservatives.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
